title: Test a Product List Screen
description: Write widget tests for a product list that uses Riverpod.
instructions: Test loading state, successful data display, and error handling.

hints.text: Use ProviderScope with overrides to mock the provider
For loading state, use pump() not pumpAndSettle()

commonMistakes.mistake: Using pumpAndSettle for loading state test
commonMistakes.consequence: Loading state never captured - it settles to final state
commonMistakes.correction: Use pump() to capture intermediate states
